Chuck Hinson said:
> And if I understand Roy[1] correctly, the only constraint is 
> that agents should not INFER properties from the URI. As 
> long as things are explicitly defined (by spec, by the server, 
> or otherwise), agents can and do make use of information 
> embedded in the URI.

THANKS for the link. I've been trying to locate it for a while.
